name: Tigershark
description:
The Ultimate War Machine... COME HELL AND HIGH WATER

2060 A.D. The Red Menace has resurfaced. The Sea Boils with submarines and battlecruisers, blood and oil. The skies are dark with enemy birds. Tigershark has been deployed. A fully-loaded subfoil prototype. Forged for war. Built for speed. Dead set on destruction. Underwater. And over it. Tigershark is hungry. The Feeding is about to begin.

  • 2 simultaneous 3-D worlds of ultra-smooth scrolling. real-time environments
  • State of the art surface and subsurface arsenal.
  • Real-time dynamic lighting and totally interactive 3-D environments.
  • Multiple views and a drop-cam!
